summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to Land Use and Zoning; approving preliminary plans for a residential planned unit development on a 9.6 acre tract in the RD 7200 Zone in Section 30, Township 26N, Range 4E, W.M. (Petition of Hurlen Homes, Inc., C.F. 287118), and amending Plat 225E, page 14 of the Official Zoning Map of the City of Seattle (Ordinance 86300).
